channel.title: Help with pickup

item.title: Help with pickup
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:5, topic:339777”][quote author=demonlover14 link=topic=436153.msg3204165#msg3204165 date=1273623052]
Magic, I don’t understand yours…
Your just saying if the command starts with this, it’ll send that message, it’ll still allow you to pick up the item.

The soul, I don’t understand yours, where are the item ids?
[/quote]

In the array, you have to add them.[/quote]
I don’t understand?
I add the first part toi the public ints at the top?
And then the 2nd into the pickup command?(HowO_o

Read full topic

item.title: Help with pickup
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

int[] restrictedItems = { id, id, id };
then:

for(int i : restrictedItems) { if(i == newItemID) { sendMessage("You cannot spawn this item."); return; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Help with pickup
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“demonlover14, post:1, topic:339777”]In the, “pickup” code below, how would I make it where the player cannot pickup certin items.
And then just add onto the list like this for exmaple.
ifAble;5608 || 5000 || 1025;
sM(“You cannot pick up this item, it has been removed from pickup”);

Something like that? and where would I add it?

[code]if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if(args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
sM(“Oops! Use as //pickup 995 100”);
}
}

}[/code][/quote]

if (command.startsWith("pickup 1234 1") {
sendMessage("You cant pick this up");
}

It’s a global command, it’ll still work even with the original one. Change 1234 to fuck knows what.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with pickup
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

In the, “pickup” code below, how would I make it where the player cannot pickup certin items.
And then just add onto the list like this for exmaple.
ifAble;5608 || 5000 || 1025;
sM(“You cannot pick up this item, it has been removed from pickup”);

Something like that? and where would I add it?

[code]if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if(args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
sM(“Oops! Use as //pickup 995 100”);
}
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
